item.title: Tripledot 背后的移动游戏 "大亨 "启动 1 亿美元投资基金
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士和相关文件透露，游戏工作室 Tripledot 的联合创始人阿金-巴巴伊吉特（Akin Babayigit）已成立了一家投资公司，为制作手机游戏的公司提供支持。【原文：Akin Babayigit, a co-founder of the gaming studio Tripledot, has formed an investment firm to back companies making mobile games, according to people familiar with the matter and documents.】

item.title: 新堡垒能源公司用波多黎各奖金换取预付现金
item.description: 新堡垒能源公司（New Fortress Energy）的一家子公司负责管理波多黎各的发电厂，由于公司急需现金，该公司放弃了未来十年可能获得的近 9 亿美元绩效奖金，以换取一次性付款。【原文：A New Fortress Energy subsidiary that manages power plants in Puerto Rico is foregoing the potential of almost $900 million in performance bonuses over the next decade in exchange for a one-time payment as the company scrambles for cash.】

item.title: 拥有 510 亿美元的防御型基金因隐藏成本而遭抨击
item.description: 对于任何担心牛市寿命的人来说，这都是一个诱人的提议：交易所交易基金能让你在股票突然下跌时避免亏损—。【原文：They’re a tempting proposition for anyone getting worried about the bull market’s longevity: exchange-traded funds that keep you from losing money — should stocks suddenly go south.】

item.title: 穆迪称私人信贷将推动更多人寿保险增长
item.description: 据穆迪评级公司称，私人信贷的兴起将继续使美国寿险公司受益，其在该资产类别中不断增长的投资将提高回报率，从而使定价更加激进。【原文：The rise of private credit will continue to benefit US life insurers, whose growing investments in the asset class bolster returns, allowing for more aggressive pricing, according to Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: Sunnova 发布持续经营警告后暴跌 50
item.description: Sunnova Energy International Inc.股价暴跌达 50%，此前这家陷入困境的太阳能公司警告称，它能否继续经营下去存在很大疑问。【原文：Shares of Sunnova Energy International Inc. plunged as much as 50% after the struggling solar company warned there’s substantial doubt it will remain in business.】

item.title: 法国股市创下历史新高，国防业反弹，政治风险减弱
item.description: 在该地区对国防类股票的新一轮狂热追捧中，法国股票基准指数创下历史新高，赶上了飙升的欧洲同行，同时投资者继续削减该国的政治风险贴水。【原文：France’s equities benchmark hit a record high, catching up with surging European peers, amid a fresh frenzy for defense stocks in the region and as investors continued to trim the country’s political risk discount.】

item.title: 俄罗斯制裁阻碍莫斯科石油运输
item.description:
该国能够继续将原油装船，但要将原油卸船却有更大的困难。【原文：

The country has been able to keep loading crude onto ships, but it’s having greater difficulty getting it off again.

】

item.title: 塔塔资本寻求在印度首次公开募股中实现高达 110 亿美元的价值
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，塔塔集团正在为其金融服务部门寻求高达 110 亿美元的估值，这可能是印度今年最大规模的首次公开募股。【原文：Tata Group is seeking a valuation of as much as $11 billion for its financial services unit in what could be India’s biggest initial public offering this year, according to people familiar with the development.】

item.title: 欧洲太阳能发电量大增，电价降至零以下
item.description: 德国太阳能园区自 9 月份以来最强劲的发电量将几个国家的价格推向负值。【原文：The strongest output in power generation from solar parks in Germany since September pushed prices in several countries into negative territory.】

item.title: 惠普与人性化人工智能初创公司的交易建立了一种不太可能的合作关系
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，奥斯汀-卡尔（Austin Carr）将探讨惠普公司收购人工智能初创公司人道公司（Humane）的大部分资产和员工这一看似奇怪的联盟。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Austin Carr looks at what appears to be a strange alliance in HP Inc.’s purchase of most of the assets and staff of AI startup Humane.】

item.title: 美国叙事从 "例外论 "转向对经济增长的担忧
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们关注的是美国经济情绪的迅速转变。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. item.title: 特朗普的乌克兰政策与关税政策有何关联？
item.description: 最近，货币学家们对国际 "马阿拉歌协议"（Mar-a-Lago Accord）的想法非常着迷，这种协议有朝一日可能会导致美元贬值。这主要是因为 11 月份一篇提出这一观点的论文的作者是即将上任的唐纳德-特朗普总统经济顾问委员会主席斯蒂芬-米兰。【原文：Currency wonks are fascinated lately by the idea of an international “Mar-a-Lago Accord” that might one day yield a dollar devaluation. Mainly because the author of a November paper proposing the notion is Stephen Miran, the incoming chair of President Donald Trump’s Council of Economic Advisers.】

item.title: 智利零售商法拉贝拉债券反弹，投资者押注投资级回报
item.description: 今年，智利 Falabella SA 公司的债券飙升，因为该零售商削减了债务水平并改组了管理团队，引发了人们对其将恢复投资级地位的猜测。【原文：Bonds in Chile’s Falabella SA have soared this year after the retailer slashed its debt levels and revamped its management team, prompting speculation it will recover its investment grade status.】

item.title: 塞内加尔美元债券在 S&P 下调评级后下跌
item.description: 塞内加尔的美元债券周一下跌，因为 S&P 全球评级公司将该国的主权信用评级进一步下调至垃圾级。【原文：Senegal’s dollar bonds fell on Monday after S&P Global Ratings downgraded the country’s sovereign credit ratings further into junk territory.】

item.title: 智利经济活动创 2021 年以来最长连涨期
item.description: 1 月份，智利经济活动连续第四个月增长，创下自 2021 年以来的最长连涨纪录，智利央行发出进一步降息的信号。【原文：Chile’s economic activity rose for the fourth straight month in January, marking the longest streak of gains since 2021 as the central bank signals there’s a high bar for further interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 焦虑不安的交易员本周将面临更多地缘政治问题
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 06:40。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 06:40 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: 储备计划遭质疑，特朗普加密货币反弹稍纵即逝
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布美国将把三种不太知名的数字代币纳入其加密货币战略储备，这在业内引起了怀疑，投资者质疑该项目的优点，他所选择的代币也放弃了一些最初的收益。【原文：Donald Trump’s announcement that the US will include three lesser-known digital tokens in its strategic crypto reserve was greeted with skepticism in the industry, with investors questioning the project’s merits and the coins he selected giving up some of their initial gains.】

item.title: 非洲制药商在拉美发展壮大，Aspen 盈利增加
item.description: 非洲最大的制药商 Aspen Pharmacare Holdings Ltd. 在拉丁美洲销售了更多麻醉药、激素替代药和抗癫痫药后，利润攀升。【原文：Aspen Pharmacare Holdings Ltd.’s profit climbed after Africa’s largest drugmaker sold more anesthetic, hormone-replacement and anti-epileptic drugs in Latin America.】

item.title: 法国在解决赤字问题的同时设法增加国防开支
item.description: 法国政府正在研究如何为提高国防开支留出余地，因为需要控制国家不断飙升的赤字和借贷成本，这对政府的选择造成了压力。【原文：The French government is looking at how to create leeway to raise defense spending as the need to rein in the country’s surging deficit and borrowing costs weigh on its options.】

item.title: 范思哲老板卡普里跃跃欲试，收购普拉达的脚步越来越近
item.description: 卡普里控股有限公司（Capri Holdings Ltd.）股价大涨，原因是这家美国公司距离将旗下意大利奢侈品牌范思哲（Versace）出售给普拉达公司（Prada SpA）的交易越来越近了。【原文：Capri Holdings Ltd. shares jumped as the U.S. company moves closer to a sale of its Italian luxury brand Versace to Prada SpA.】

item.title: 西班牙纳斯卡资本启动 4 亿欧元国防基金
item.description: 西班牙私募股权公司 Nazca Capital 正在筹建其第一支投资于国防公司的基金。【原文：Spanish private equity firm Nazca Capital is working on its first fund to invest in defense companies.】

item.title: 航空航天供应商 Senior 即将出售航空结构业务
item.description: Senior Plc 正在与航空结构业务的潜在买家进行最后谈判，这家英国工程公司正寻求精简业务。【原文：Senior Plc is in final negotiations with potential buyers of its aerostructures business as the UK engineering company seeks to streamline its operations.】

item.title: 艾伯维通过高达 22 亿美元的 Gubra 交易进军肥胖症市场
item.description: 艾伯维公司同意以高达 22 亿美元的价格收购丹麦生物技术公司 Gubra A/S 的一种下一代肥胖症药物，这标志着该公司进入了竞争激烈的减肥市场。【原文：AbbVie Inc. agreed to pay as much as $2.2 billion for a next-generation obesity drug from Danish biotech Gubra A/S, marking its entry into the hyper-competitive weight-loss market.】

item.title: 美国股市落后于全球股市，预示着股市将迎来艰难的一年
item.description: 2025 年初，全球股市大胜美国股市，这是一个不祥的历史信号，预示着美国投资者今年余下时间的走势。【原文：Equity markets around the world are trouncing US stocks in early 2025, an ominous historical signal for how the rest of the year could shape up for US investors.】

item.title: 奥地利在经济衰退和极右翼势力阴影下组建新内阁
item.description: 大选结束五个多月后，奥地利任命了一个由保守派领导的政府，负责使经济走出衰退，同时削减预算赤字，扭转右翼民粹主义抬头的趋势。【原文：More than five months after elections, Austria appointed a conservative-led government entrusted with pulling the economy out of recession while cutting the budget deficit and reversing a surge in right-wing populism.】

item.title: 欧洲央行进入最后削减阶段，欧元区通胀降温
item.description: 在欧洲中央银行进入最后一轮降息之际，欧元区通胀有所放缓，增强了人们对通胀接近 2% 目标的信心。【原文：Euro-area inflation eased, boosting confidence that it’s approaching the 2% target as the European Central Bank enters the last leg of interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 墨西哥的明星经济梦想在唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁下破灭
item.description: 就在几年前，制造商们还在为搬迁到墨西哥东北部的工业城市蒙特雷而争夺空间，因为他们希望搬到离美国及其庞大的消费市场更近的地方。如今，房地产商提供了灵活的租赁计划，以便将企业留在该地区。【原文：Only a couple years ago, manufacturers were fighting for space to relocate their operations to Monterrey, an industrial city in Mexico’s northeast, as they sought to move closer to the US and its vast consumer market. These days, real estate agents are offering flexible rental plans to keep businesses in the area.】

item.title: 比亚迪寻求配售融资高达 52 亿美元，条款显示
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）看到的交易条款，电动汽车制造商比亚迪股份有限公司（BYD Co.【原文：Electric-vehicle maker BYD Co. is seeking to raise as much as HK$40.7 billion ($5.2 billion) in a primary placement, according to terms of the deal seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 风险警惕型交易员抛售赢家，大型科技公司痛苦加剧
item.description: 一段时间以来，人们有很多理由担心大型科技股。大幅上涨后的估值捉襟见肘、人工智能方面的巨额支出以及对未来增长的高预期。但几个月来，这些似乎都不重要。【原文：For some time now, there have been plenty of reasons to worry about Big Tech stocks. Stretched valuations after a big run up, heavy spending on artificial intelligence and lofty expectations for future growth. For months, though, none of it seemed to matter.】

item.title: 英国房贷审批保持稳定，力争不加税
item.description: 英国 1 月份的抵押贷款批准量降幅小于预期，这表明购房者仍在赶在一项关键税收上调之前完成交易。【原文：UK mortgage approvals dipped less than forecast in January, suggesting homebuyers are still rushing to complete transactions before a key tax goes up.】
